original_text: Now he told a parable to those who were invited, when he noticed how they chose the places of honor, saying to them,
korean_text: 청함을 받은 사람들이 높은 자리 택함을 보시고 그들에게 비유로 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: Now he told a parable to those who were invited
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 초청받은 사람들에게 비유 하나를 말씀하셨는데

sentences.original_text: when he noticed how they chose the places of honor
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 귀한 자리를 택하는 것을 보고
